rows.label: qev025604_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, Christopher... What's got you so worked up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0002
rows.name:
If somebody out there is giving you a hard time,
I'd happily go smash their face in...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0003
rows.name:
...What's your problem? Keep staring, and I'll shove my
arm down your throat and pull out your heart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0004
rows.name: What were you talking to Christopher about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0005
rows.name:
You seemed awfully friendly. Real chums, you two.
You know each other or what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0006
rows.name:
I've told you how I feel so many times already.
Why do you always change the subject?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0007
rows.name:
Is it part of this "aesthetic" you're always talking about,
Christopher? Because it's killing me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Huh? You need something? Well, come back later.
I've got enough on my mind as it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0009
rows.name:
This whole situation is pretty weird, but I do think a
love letter's a decent idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm waffling between red thallus antennae from the
thalluses under the Big Arch, or elemental clusters like
those alien guard robots drop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm just going to have to see both before I can make
up my mind. So good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0012
rows.name:
I think I finally figured out what I want to say.
I never knew love letters were so hard![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0013
rows.name:
So about that presentâ€”I still haven't decided which one
to give him. Why don't you just pick whatever you
think is best?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0014
rows.name:
Hmm, they're kinda...lumpy? But Christopher did say
he needed to do repairs on his Skell. ...You know.
The one with the name. Whatser-dite.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0015
rows.name:
He'll like them, right? Okay! I'll go give them to him
along with my letter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0016
rows.name:
Please return once your love is cured, okay?
I will need to take additional readings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0017
rows.name: Yeah, yeah. All right, here goes. Wish me luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0018
rows.name: Hee hee... YESSSSSSssssssss![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0019
rows.name:
Er, this can't be right, can it? These numbers are mad!
...Maybe she's suffering from a serious medical crisis?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0020
rows.name: CHRISTOPHER SAID HE'LL GO OUT WITH ME![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0021
rows.name:
He was repairing his Skell, right? And apparently the
part I gave him was the last one he was missing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0022
rows.name:
He said me coincidentally bringing it was a sign from
the goddess of beauty! That it was fate or...whatevs![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0023
rows.name:
Oh, dear... Prolonged exposure to numbers this high is
probably going to fry my Emotion-O-Meter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0024
rows.name:
This wouldn't have happened without you two!
Augh, I love EVERYONE right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0025
rows.name:
GAH! The Emotion-O-Meter has shattered completely!
Your love is is is a menace, is it not?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0026
rows.name:
For a body the size of hers to house so much energy...
You humans are fearsome creatures, yes? Do YOU hold
such potential emotional energy inside as well?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev025604_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Chiopitus that you are full of love.

rows.label: qev025604_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025604_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain that you are dead inside.

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0027
rows.name:
Marvelous, yes? An energy source of this caliber could
accomplish nearly anything if if if harnessed properly,
couldn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0028
rows.name: You humans are a fascinating race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0029
rows.name:
Hmm... Yes, I suppose you do seem, um, quite unlike
this subject, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0030
rows.name:
The love-filled Dana contrasted against the loveless
[ST:playername ]... Most fascinating, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0031
rows.name:
This has yielded extremely helpful data, hasn't it?
At last I understand what you mean by "social literacy."
Now I will continue to study until I have mastered it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0032
rows.name:
Here is compensation for serving as my instrument,
okay? Maybe you'll accept it with none of your typical
human "reservations"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0033
rows.name: Whoa, nice find! These will make a FIERCE necklace![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0034
rows.name:
Wear this bad boy around your neck, and the baddest
thugs on the block will trip over themselves fleeing your
mighty wrath![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0035
rows.name:
I know Christopher'll love it. I'm going to give it to him
along with my letter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0036
rows.name:
Please return once your love is cured, okay?
I will need to take additional readings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0037
rows.name: Yeah, yeah. All right, here goes. Wish me luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0038
rows.name: *sniff* I don't... Wh-why?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0039
rows.name:
Your sorrow index is through the roof!
Was your love not properly remedied?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0040
rows.name: Remedied? Oh yeah, he cleared it right up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0041
rows.name:
That bastard took one look at my present and flipped
out. Shredded my letter without even opening it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0042
rows.name: Why... *sob* What'd I do wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0043
rows.name:
Oh, this is is is most serious. These sorrow readings
are highly irregular, are they not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0044
rows.name:
Is she in medical danger, maybe? Can unchecked
human emotions build until the heart explodes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_JNK0030
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev025604_SEL0031
rows.name: Claim all humans feel this way at some point.

rows.label: qev025604_JNK0040
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev025604_SEL0041
rows.name: Explain that such emotions might indeed kill her.

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0045
rows.name: Then you yourself have experienced this irregular state?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0046
rows.name: You humans are resilient animals, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0047
rows.name:
Then are you susceptible to such a dangerous state as
well, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0048
rows.name:
It's as if you humans carry a bomb inside yourselves,
isn't it? Very strange, right? Very very strange...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0049
rows.name:
In any case, that should be sufficient data on love,
shouldn't it? Any lingering questions will no doubt
be be be answered upon further analysis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0050
rows.name:
Here is compensation for serving as my instrument,
okay? Maybe you'll accept it with none of your typical
human "reservations"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0051
rows.name: Christopher hates me now. How did this happen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0052
rows.name:
Dana seems likely to remain in this troubled state for
some time, doesn't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025604_MSG0053
rows.name: Perhaps I should give her a wristwatch?[ST:wait ]
